General.Name: Multi Bintang Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Multi Bintang Indonesia Tbk produces and markets alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages in Indonesia. The company offers beers under the Heineken and Bintang Pilsner brands; cold-brewed beers under the Bintang Crystal brand name; Bintang Radler Lemon, a fusion of Bintang beer and natural citrus juice; zero alcohol beer and zero alcohol carbonated malt beverages under the Bintang brand; and carbonated soft drinks under the Green Sands brand names. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multi Bintang Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Heineken International B.V.
